summary: Three friends since childhood are trying to work out their complicated relationships. Jonny tries to be best friends with Magnus, Magnus tries to be married to Tuva, and Tuva tries to have sex with Jonny.
cast: Aksel Hennie|Laila Goody|Fridtjov Såheim|Marit Andreassen|Bjørn Sundquist|Nils Vogt|Anders Ødegård|Silje Salomonsen|Trond Brænne|Mads Jørgensen|Eivind Sander|Jan Hårstad|Nikis Theophilakis|Adessa M. Franco|Kari Borg|Leif Blix|Jan Grønli|Joachim Calmeyer|Tobias Vatsgar|Anna Husøy|Henrik Bilben
title: Jonny Vang
